topics.body:
I haven't noticed this until now, but for some reason...
It seems like Hakase's kind of a jerk to Nano.

What's with all the weird and pointless features in Nano? All she wants to do is to go out and be "normal", despite being a robot girl. And Hakase's all like "moar cake rolls" because reasons and Nano doesn't seem to get much of a say.

topics.body:
I don't get Nichijou.
This show and what it does should be making me interested, I should like these characters, and I should be laughing at this.

Except I'm not.

_And I mean for crying out loud, I'm currently watching an over-the-top chase scene where Mio is trying to catch Yukko with her math homework that contains an embarrassing doodle of some Japanese pretty boy!_

*WHY AM I NOT LAUGHING OR AT LEAST SMILING AT THIS?*
topics.author: 536f7a11636872666e2d0000

I remember back in our dance class, we were tasked to make our own modern dance. All I did was do rifle handling without the rifle, I got a 1.

Note: 1 is the highest score with 5 being the lowest. 3 is usually the passing.
